title: How does '1984' by George Orwell influence modern society today? - Quora

response.answer_text: How does "1984" by George Orwell influence modern society today? MASSIVELY! 1984 has become part of what everybody knows - it’s hard to overstate just how much of that novel has embedded itself into our culture People who have never read the book - or even heard of it - know about “Big Brother” and “Newspeak”
